Html:
Hi all,

i'm trying to load a lot of markers on the map, but the markers loading very very slow. Is there a possibility to load a lot of markers very fast?
it's pretty fast, check the traffic demos

thank you for the fast answer. Now it loads pretty fast, but the map renders very slow if I'm moving the map around or if I try to zoom in. Is there a way to increase the performance of the rendering speed?
well the more objects you render, the slower it gets, but you can try some tricks, like setting overlay invisible before/while moving/zooming
